Articles.Content:
I thought it would be cool for people to post their tracking station and some information about it. Specifically how many flights you have going right now and the current time of your longest mission.

I currently have 9 flights going, all operating around Kerbin and its moons.

My longest flight is the first satellite who's orbit I was happy with, it is currently at 4 years 80 days.

Its a relatively new save file... 97 active flights (in about 30 game days)

K-Sat series - 45 satellites in various orbits around Kerbin

Mun-Sat series - 20 satellites in various orbits around the Mun

Min-Sat Series - 20 satellites in various orbits around Minmus

Salvation 1- a probe on a solar escape Trajectory

DS-Sun- probe in a low orbit around the sun

HKO Research Station - a station sharing an orbit with the MUN

2 spacecraft safely landed at Kerbin

1 Spacecraft crash-landed on the Mun (crew was rescued)

2 Flags on the Mun

Dun-Sat and Jul-Sat are each in LKO preparing to deploy 10 satellites each to Duna and Jool respectively as their windows arrive.
First successful satellite in orbit!

Its a relatively new save file... 97 active flights (in about 30 game days)

K-Sat series - 45 satellites in various orbits around Kerbin

Mun-Sat series - 20 satellites in various orbits around the Mun

Min-Sat Series - 20 satellites in various orbits around Minmus

Salvation 1- a probe on a solar escape Trajectory

DS-Sun- probe in a low orbit around the sun

HKO Research Station - a station sharing an orbit with the MUN

2 spacecraft safely landed at Kerbin

1 Spacecraft crash-landed on the Mun (crew was rescued)

2 Flags on the Mun

Dun-Sat and Jul-Sat are each in LKO preparing to deploy 10 satellites each to Duna and Jool respectively as their windows arrive.

I have always wondered, do you every worry about hitting one of your many satellites while setting this kind of thing up? Also are they all designed the same or is each one unique?
no dont worry about it...only time I worry about crashing to a spacecraft is in rendezvous... and these particular sats consist of about 5-6 different designs...
My space agency so far; doing okay but had a small accident in Duna orbit :/

My space agency so far; doing okay but had a small accident in Duna orbit :/

Wow, What happened there?

I was getting this 625 part guy (minus the rockets) to Duna when it randomly collapsed (I guess, there were no explosions. It just gave up on me lol). My impractical refueling station which can attach 32 large orange tanks on the bottom, mainly just to see whether I could do it.
